party_invite: (?:\[.*] )?(?<player>\S{1,16}) has invited you to join (?:their|(?:\[.*] ?)?\w{1,16}'s)? party!
skyblock_trade_request: (?<player>\S{1,16}) has sent you a trade request\. Click here to accept!$
guild_invite: Click here to accept or type (?<command>\/guild accept (?<name>\w+))!
guild_party: (\?[.*] )?(?<player>\S{1,16}) has invited all members of (?<guild>\S+) to their party!
